Docs.param: The ID that defines the clause to create.

An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the nonce that was used to create a derived key. Sets the value that is returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.GetDerivationNonce%2A> method.
The size of the derived key. Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength%2A> property.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified ID, nonce, and key size.
